availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Lincoln County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Susan A. Harris. Father of Sally W. Harris, Nancy Harris, Reuben Harris, Samuel Harris, Susan Harris, Bettie Harris, Margaret Harris, and Annie Harris. Farmer in Lincoln County in 1850. Owned eleven enslaved persons in 1850. Farmer in Lincoln County in 1860. Owned fifteen enslaved persons in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, District no. 1, p. 245.

Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, Stanford, p. 88B.
